recipesJson.name: Lemon Cookie
recipesJson.author: MattyWill
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is a lemon sugar cookie.  The FA. Cookie and FLV. Cookie Dough mix well together making a delicious cookie that's not to light not to dark but perfect. The CAP. Juicy Lemon FA. Lemon Sicily and FW. Blueberry make a lemon that just pops. 
PLEASE MIX THIS UP AND LET ME KNOW WHAT YOU THINK.âœŒ

reviews.text: This is good stuff.. Not too lemony.. Not too cookie-ey.. Just a nice lemon cookie. I kinda want to throw some coconut in this mix. :)
